AllowCapa_Description: If set to true, product features can be enabled/disabled on user or tenant level
AllowPostLogin_Description: If set to true, credentials can be submitted via POST request
CsrfTokenProtection_Description: If set to true, CSRF protection is enabled
CronTimeToRunSeconds_Description: Defines intervals in seconds to run a routine of deleting temporary files
CronTimeToKillSeconds_Description: Defines minimal age in seconds of temporary files to be deleted
CronTimeFile_Description: Defines filename for storing last timestamp when routine of deleting temporary files was run
UserSelectsDateFormat_Description: If set to true, users can select date format
Disabled_Description: Setting to true disables the module
LanguageListComment: Empty array means that every language from every module will be available. ["English", "German"] means that only English and German languages will be used in the system.
LanguageList_Description: Empty array means that every language from every module will be available. ["English", "German"] means that only English and German languages will be used in the system.
AutodetectLanguage_Description: Setting to true enables language autodetection
PostLoginErrorRedirectUrl_Description: If login credentials were supplied with POST method, this setting defines redirect URL used when authentication error occurs
TimeFormat_Description: Denotes time format used by default
SiteName_Description: Text used in browser title as a website name
ProductName_Description: Product name, displayed in About tab of adminpanel
AuthTokenCookieExpireTime_Description: Expiration time for authentication cookie, in days
EnableFailedLoginBlock_Description: Setting to true enables feature of blocking user after a number of failed login attempts
LoginBlockAvailableTriesCount_Descriptio: Number of failed login attempts which will result in blocking user
LoginBlockDurationMinutes_Description: Number of minutes user will be blocked for upon multiple failed login attempts
AllowGroups_Description: Setting to true enables user groups which can be managed in adminpanel
